p:
The SARS virus had an overall CFR of 11%.
24 Women represented 55.7% of those diagnosed with SARS but had a lower CFR than men (13.2 and 22.3%, respectively).
24 About 49% of cases were <40 years old with a CFR of 3%, whereas 21.5% of cases were >59 years with the highest CFR among those >59 years (54.5%). Nearly a quarter of cases (23.1%) were healthcare workers with the lowest CFR (2%).
24
